  • Classes in com.tloj.game.entities used by com.tloj.game.abilities
    Class
    Description
    Boss
    Abstract class to represent the Boss class in the game.
    Mob
    Represents a mob in the game.
  • Classes in com.tloj.game.entities used by com.tloj.game.collectables
    Class
    Description
    Character
    Abstract class to represent a character in the game.
    A Character is a moving entity that can engage in combat with Mobs and interact with NPCs.
    It is controlled by the user.
  • Classes in com.tloj.game.entities used by com.tloj.game.collectables.items
    Class
    Description
    Character
    Abstract class to represent a character in the game.
    A Character is a moving entity that can engage in combat with Mobs and interact with NPCs.
    It is controlled by the user.
  • Classes in com.tloj.game.entities used by com.tloj.game.entities
    Class
    Description
    Character
    Abstract class to represent a character in the game.
    A Character is a moving entity that can engage in combat with Mobs and interact with NPCs.
    It is controlled by the user.
    CombatEntity
    An abstract class representing an entity that can either attack and be attacked
    This includes the Character (the player), the Mobs and the Bosses
    All combat entities have a health pool, an attack stat and a defense stat
    Entity
    An abstract class that represents an entity in the game.
    An entity is anything that can be interacted with in the game.
    This includes the Character (the player), the Mobs and the Bosses
    Inventory
    Represents the inventory of an entity in the game.
    ItemsHolderEntity
    Interface to represent an entity that can hold items in its inventory.
    Mob
    Represents a mob in the game.
    MovingEntity
    Represents an entity that can move in the game.
  • Classes in com.tloj.game.entities used by com.tloj.game.entities.bosses

  • Classes in com.tloj.game.entities used by com.tloj.game.entities.npcs
    Class
    Description
    Character
    Abstract class to represent a character in the game.
    A Character is a moving entity that can engage in combat with Mobs and interact with NPCs.
    It is controlled by the user.
    Entity
    An abstract class that represents an entity in the game.
    An entity is anything that can be interacted with in the game.
    This includes the Character (the player), the Mobs and the Bosses
    FriendlyEntity
    An abstract class representing a friendly entity in the game.
    ItemReceiverEntity
    An interface representing an entity that can receive items in the game
    This interface is meant to be implemented by entities that can receive items as Smith
    ItemsHolderEntity
    Interface to represent an entity that can hold items in its inventory.
